metadata.title: CVE-2023-6857 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: When resolving a symlink, a race may occur where the buffer passed to`readlink` may actually be smaller than necessary. *This bug only affectsFirefox on Unix-based operating systems (Android, Linux, MacOS). Windows isunaffected.* This vulnerability affects Firefox ESR < 115.6, Thunderbird <115.6, and Firefox < 121.

criterions.comment: firefox: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
thunderbird: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
mozjs38: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
mozjs52 package in esm-infra/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
